topic.title: CODED PROCEDURE AND PROCEDURE STATUS (SNOMED CT)
topic.shortdesc: CODED PROCEDURE AND PROCEDURE STATUS (SNOMED CT) is the SNOMED CT EXPRESSION which is used to identify a Patient Procedure plus the status of the Patient Procedure.
